results.p: 6 days ago — verb (1) · 1. : to cause to incline. wind bowing the treetops · 2. : to incline especially in respect or submission. bow their heads in prayer.
noun · a lowering or inclination of the head or body as a mark of respect, greeting, or assent · to acknowledge or receive applause or praise.
BOW meaning: 1 : to bend forward at the neck or waist as a formal way of greeting someone or showing respect often + to; 2 : to turn (your head) down so ...

results.t: Bow and arrow | History, Construction & Uses

results.p: Bow most often refers to: Bow and arrow, a weapon; Bowing, bending the upper body as a social gesture; An ornamental knot made of ribbon.
noun the act of bending the head, body, or knee as a sign of reverence or submission or shame or greeting
